title: $1317 -- Rome and Tuscany: 8-Night Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1317 -- Rome and Tuscany: 8-Night Vacations $1317 -- Rome and Tuscany: 8-Night Vacations   - October 2, 2015 at 3:26 PM Tweet 
Great Value Vacation's "Tuscan Castle & Rome Villa Vacation" package allows you to live like royalty in Italy's Chianti region and also gaze at the Sistine Chapel in Rome. The eight-night package starts at $1,317 per person and includes round-trip airfare from New York (other departure locations are available at a higher price), six nights' accommodations at the Montegufoni Castle in Tuscany and two nights in Villa Vecchia in Rome, as well as a manual-shift economy car rental for the duration of your stay. Also included are airline fuel surcharges. Plus, you can tack on one and two nights to the tripâ€”$75 and $150, respectively. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City; other departure cities are available at varying rates Six nights at the Montegufoni Castle in Tuscany Two nights at the Villa Vecchia in Rome Manual-shift economy car rental for the duration of stay Airline taxes and fuel surcharges 
How to get this deal: Visit Great Value Vacations 's website. The lowest price is available out of New York City during various dates throughout 2015 and 2016. Additional departure cities are available at higher rates. The sale provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
